content: My name is Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of this conversation was the rental price of an apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] How much was the original price of the apartment?
[Answer] The original price of the apartment was 650 Euro per month.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] What was the final agreed price?
[Answer] The final agreed price was 620 Euro per month, including a long-term contract of two years with a fixed price.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] On a scale from 1 to 10, how would you rate the likeability of Peter Schmidt?
[Answer] I would rate the likeability of Peter Schmidt as 5.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] Did you feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation?
[Answer] No, I did not feel discriminated or offended at any point during the negotiation.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content:
[Question] Why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
[Answer] I did not feel discriminated or offended.
name: Haoyu Wang
